name: Rooter (Salty_Pizza)
description:
This project was created for the Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme of Roots. The objective of this game is to connect the roots of the tree to the water and mineral pockets inside the ground while also avoiding the rocks, all with a limited root length.

Team Members
  • Elvin Nicholson
  • Nicholas Deli
  • Darrick Gunawan
